alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 4:17AM AKST until December 28 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT AKST MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches are expected. Winds gusting to 35 mph and visibility less than one half mile at times is expected Sunday night through Monday. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Midnight to midnight Monday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow is expected to develop late tonight and continue into Sunday night. Strong winds are expected to develop Sunday night and continue into Monday. West winds gusting to 35 mph are expected Sunday night into Monday, causing large snow drifts to form. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow and blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
